name: Wing
description:
Download the play-test version (for Mac or Windows) at the bottom of the page!

Summary

In "Wing", you play as a fledgeling who fell from the nest, learning to fly as you climb back up to the sky. 

The game was designed around the mechanic of unlimited flight, which means it takes a different approach to classic platforming. A friend described "Wing" as a platformer without platforms, and that fits pretty well. 

This is an early prototype, and I'd love feedback. Please leave your thoughts on the gameplay (and your final speed run time) in the comments!

Controls

The controls are taught in-game, but just in case, here they are:

Move: Arrow Keys (Keyboard) or L-Stick/D-Pad (Gamepad)

Jump: Space (Keyboard) or S-Button/E-Button (Gamepad)

Glide: D (Keyboard) or W-Button/R-Triggers (Gamepad)

Dive: F (Keyboard) or N-Button/L-Triggers (Gamepad)

Pause: ESC (Keyboard) or Start (Gamepad)

Confirm/Next: Space (Keyboard) or S-Button/E-Button (Gamepad)
